metadata.synopsis: PAD that plays if you decide to tell the Gur Hunter in the Swamp where to find Astarion (HAG_GurHunter.lsj).  You tell the Hunter where your camp is, the Hunter says he'll take Astarion during the night the next time you go to sleep, then the dialog ends and this PAD plays.Your companion reacts to your decision to hand Astarion over (speaker 2) and then you clarify/justify your decision (speaker 1)
metadata.how_to_trigger: With a companion in your party and Astarion at your camp, speak to the Gur Hunter in the Swamp, reveal that you know Astarion, and tell the Hunter where your camp is.PAD plays once the dialog ends.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: You gave him up? I wasn't sure you would.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: He's too dangerous to have around. We'd always be sleeping with one eye open.
